mapper.select: select test_listening_judgement_by_picture_id, test_id, listening_judgement_by_picture_id from Test_Listening_Judgement_By_Picture where test_listening_judgement_by_picture_id = #{testListeningJudgementByPictureId}
mapper.insert:
insert into Test_Listening_Judgement_By_Picture(test_id, listening_judgement_by_picture_id) values
(#{entity.testId}, #{entity.listeningJudgementByPictureId})
on duplicate key update test_id = values(test_id), listening_judgement_by_picture_id = values(listening_judgement_by_picture_id)
mapper.update:
update Test_Listening_Judgement_By_Picture
test_id = #{testId},
listening_judgement_by_picture_id = #{listeningJudgementByPictureId},
where test_listening_judgement_by_picture_id = #{testListeningJudgementByPictureId}
